exampleInput: In 1073, the great Sakya Pandita received the Hevajra empowerment from Drogmi Lotsawa at Mugulung Monastery. The teaching lasted three days and was attended by over 500 monks. During the empowerment, Sakya Pandita taught the Hevajra Tantra root text. After receiving the empowerment, he entered a six-month retreat at age 25, during which he attained realization of the deity.
